dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: History is written by the victors. The ones with the shiny armor, the destiny-forged swords, and the unlimited credit cards.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: But what about the fodder? The XP grind? The Level 1 trash mobs? Today, history takes... the path less taken.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: You are a Goblin. You have 5 HP. You have a wood for a weapon. And your goal? survive Him.

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: USE [WASD] TO COWER. PRESS [SPACE] TO SCURRY.

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Ugh, finally the tutorial zone. Alright, where’s the boss? I need to speedrun this before my EXP boost potion expires.

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Oh, just a mob. Out of my way, trash.

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Glitchy hitbox... whatever. Not worth the mana.

dialogue.speaker: Traumatized Goblin
dialogue.text: New spawn? I assume he got you good huh

dialogue.speaker: Traumatized Goblin
dialogue.text: That man is crazy, He just shouts 'FOR EXP!!!' and bullets just come at you.

dialogue.speaker: Traumatized Goblin
dialogue.text: *sighs* If only there was a way we can deflect the bullets back at him.

dialogue.speaker: Traumatized Goblin
dialogue.text: I know! I made this device that might help me beat him someday, why don't you give it a try? the doors that way.

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Legendary drop rate is 0.5%? That’s rigged. I should open a support ticket.

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Wait. You again? I swear I cleared this area. Is the respawn timer broken?

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Whatever. Free XP is free XP.

dialogue.speaker: Armor Smith
dialogue.text: A goblin? Buying armor? Hah! I don't make goblin sizes.

dialogue.speaker: Armor Smith
dialogue.text: But... if you're planning to fight Him... take this advice for free.

dialogue.speaker: Armor Smith
dialogue.text: His shiny armor? It’s elemental. He swaps elements every time he takes damage....

dialogue.speaker: Armor Smith
dialogue.text: Wait a minute, you're a goblin! I gotta explain it simpler. Matchy Color NO NO, Opposite color YES YES. You get it right?

dialogue.speaker: Armor Smith
dialogue.text: Anyway you gotta test out what you've learned, the doors that way.

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Stupid collision detection! Why can't I climb this? I paid $50 for the Climbing Boots DLC!

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Okay, seriously? Stop following me. You’re ruining my immersion. Get lost, you buggy little NPC, or I’m reporting this to the devs.

dialogue.speaker: Monkey
dialogue.text: Ooh ooh! Ahh ahh!

dialogue.speaker: Monkey
dialogue.text: Ooh! (Points to banana, mimes falling aggressively)

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: I AM TRYING TO STREAM HERE! Stop stream-sniping me!

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: BEGONE!

dialogue.speaker: System
dialogue.text: YOU DIED. (But death is just a mechanic, isn't it?)

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: Heh. Rough day? He got you with the 'Ultimate Whale Slash,' or what he calls it didn't he?

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: Listen closely, little friend. He’s not skilled. He’s rich! He bought all of those gear just to be 'All Powerful'

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: But his wallet has a weakness... impatience. He attacks relentlessly because he bought the 'Stamina Infinite' pass.

dialogue.speaker: Merchant
dialogue.text: But he can't turn. He can't stop. Use his momentum against him. He's just a wallet with a sword.

dialogue.speaker: The Hero
dialogue.text: Okay. That’s it. No more games. I’m popping my Ultimate Elixirs. I’m activating my buffs. I am going to delete your sprite from the game files!

triggers.speaker: The Hero
triggers.text: Who put fruit on the battlefield?! My $500 boots!

triggers.speaker: The Hero
triggers.text: How are you piercing my Diamond-Tier subscription armor?!

triggers.speaker: The Hero
triggers.text: Impossible... My gear score... is over 9000... How could a free-to-play mob...

epilogue.speaker: Narrator
epilogue.text: And so, the path less taken led to the greatest victory of all. The server is quiet. The loot is... well, you can't use it, it's class-locked. But the silence? That's yours. Good game, Goblin. Good game.

dialogue.text: Another day, another grind.
